summary: This document is an email exchange between Paul Morris and Paul Barrett discussing a lunch meeting. Both individuals are managing directors at Deutsche Bank, and they coordinate their schedules for a meeting. The communication is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is coordinating a lunch meeting with Paul Barrett and is flexible with his schedule.

persons.name: Paul Barrett
persons.context: Paul Barrett is responding to Paul Morris about their lunch plans and indicates his availability.

connections.description: Both are managing directors at Deutsche Bank and are coordinating a lunch meeting.

keyFacts: The email exchange is dated October 24-25, 2013.
Paul Morris and Paul Barrett are both managing directors at Deutsche Bank.
They are discussing scheduling a lunch meeting for the following week.
